name: I left Earth because I have no friends
name_original: I left Earth because I have no friends
description:
NOTE, USE THE FULL SCREEN VIEW FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE

Humans are weird.

We tend to place social interaction above all else. Social interactions are so valuable to humans that they have entire companies dedicated to the practice of harvesting information around these interactions and selling this information to the highest bidder. Ironically, this has had the effect of isolating people from each other. 

Your frustration has reached a boiling point, and you have decided to leave this planet for good, in a rocket no less.

The first digital game I made while an undergrad at UCSC, for CMPM 80K.
